title: wolfwood1
author: wolfwood1
content: We are recruiting moderators who can speak Vietnamese.<Recruitment conditions>1. Person who has operated Discord2. A person who can speak local Vietnamese, not a translator3. Salary: 150 USDT per month4. Business: (1) Introduction and guidance to P2E fishing game users(2) Helper of the event in accordance with the guidelines of the headquarters of Giverway, etc5. a talkative and lively person- If the activity is so low that it is not visible to the head office, it may be terminated.Telegram : @Wd_wolf
